amendment.description: to express the sense of the Senate concerning summer food pilot projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2785 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2785 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2681; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2681) to express the sense of the Senate concerning summer food pilot projects.
